summary: An email from 2025 summarizing information from a 2019 meeting with Ghislaine Maxwell's attorneys, referencing trial testimony and allegations involving Jeffrey Epstein, Maxwell, Donald Trump, Prince Andrew, Alan Dershowitz, and Glen Dubin. It includes an attachment of Maxwell's initial indictment.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email references a meeting with her attorneys and summarizes trial testimony alleging she instructed a victim to perform sexual acts for Epstein and others.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as 'JE' in summarized testimony; alleged to have been told by Maxwell's victim 'This is a good one' in a context involving Donald Trump.

persons.name: Donald Trump
persons.context: Mentioned in summarized victim testimony; one victim stated Epstein told Trump 'This is a good one' about her at Mar-A-Lago, while another said Trump was polite and she was not a victim of Trump.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Mentioned in summarized testimony; a victim stated Maxwell told her to 'make him happy' and do the same things for him as she did for Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Alan Dershowitz
persons.context: Mentioned in the summarized testimony; a victim knew his name but no specific context was provided in the interview.

persons.name: Glen Dubin
persons.context: Mentioned in summarized testimony; a victim stated Maxwell told her she had to do to Dubin what she did to Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Maxwell is alleged to have instructed a victim to perform sexual acts for Epstein and to do the same for others.
Maxwell allegedly told a victim to 'make him happy' and perform the same acts for him as for Epstein.
Maxwell allegedly told a victim she had to do to Dubin what she did to Jeffrey Epstein.
A victim testified that Epstein told Trump 'This is a good one' about her at Mar-A-Lago.

events.title: Meeting with Maxwell's Attorneys
events.description: A meeting occurred with Ghislaine Maxwell's attorneys, with AUSAs (Assistant U.S. Attorneys) present.

events.title: Trial Testimony Summarized
events.description: The email summarizes victim testimony from Ghislaine Maxwell's trial, including allegations about Epstein, Trump, Prince Andrew, and Glen Dubin.

events.title: Alleged Incident at Mar-A-Lago
events.description: A victim (approx. 14-15 years old) testified that Jeffrey Epstein told Donald Trump 'This is a good one' about her at Mar-A-Lago.

keyFacts: A meeting with Ghislaine Maxwell's attorneys and AUSAs took place on October 8, 2019.
Trial testimony included an allegation that Jeffrey Epstein told Donald Trump 'This is a good one' about an approximately 14-15 year old girl at Mar-A-Lago.
The same victim clarified she was not a victim of Donald Trump and that Trump was polite to her.
Another victim testified that Ghislaine Maxwell instructed her to 'make Prince Andrew happy' and to do the same things for him as she did for Jeffrey Epstein, and similarly for Glen Dubin.
Alan Dershowitz was mentioned by a victim who knew his name, but no context was provided in the interview.
